com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.documentmerge

Class DocumentMergeOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.documentmerge.DocumentMergeOptions

  • public class DocumentMergeOptions
extends Object
    Parameters for specifying the input JSON data and the desired output format for DocumentMergeOperation.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Fragments getFragments()
      Returns the input fragments data for document merge process.
      org.json.JSONObject getJsonDataForMerge()
      Represents the input datasource for the document merge process as a JSON Object

      Returns the intended target format of the generated output document.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DocumentMergeOptions

        public DocumentMergeOptions(org.json.JSONObject jsonDataForMerge,
                            OutputFormat outputFormat)
        Creates a new DocumentMergeOptions instance
        Parameters:
        jsonDataForMerge - JSON object specifying the input datasource for the document merge process
        outputFormat - target format of the generated output document

      • DocumentMergeOptions

        public DocumentMergeOptions(org.json.JSONObject jsonDataForMerge,
                            OutputFormat outputFormat,
                            Fragments fragments)
        Creates a new DocumentMergeOptions instance
        Parameters:
        jsonDataForMerge - JSON object specifying the input datasource for the document merge process
        outputFormat - target format of the generated output document
        fragments - Object for providing the fragments, List of JSON Object for resolving fragments in the input document for document merge process; Can be null or empty.

    • Method Detail

      • getJsonDataForMerge

        public org.json.JSONObject getJsonDataForMerge()
        Represents the input datasource for the document merge process as a JSON Object
        Returns:
        the input JSON Data to be merged with document template

      • getOutputFormat

        public OutputFormat getOutputFormat()
        Returns the intended target format of the generated output document. Possible values are PDF and DOCX.
        Returns:
        the output file format

      • getFragments

        public Fragments getFragments()
        Returns the input fragments data for document merge process.
        Returns:
        the fragments input data
